column3: ## PAGE 2 - About
Check the application progress Menu at the right

column4: 1st page marked with a tick, 2nd tab marked orange as active

column3: Click on the (1) in the application progress menu

column4: You're taken to the first tab

column3: Create an error (eg. Change the answer to the 1st question to "No")
Click on the (2) in the application progress menu

column4: You're taken to the 2nd tab, 1st tab is marked red as containing invalid answers

column3: Click "Back" at the bottom of 2nd tab

column4: You're taken to the 1st tab

column3: Change the answer to Yes
Scroll to the bottom and click Next

column4: Journal Title, Link to the journal's homepage, ISSN, Keywords, Languages, Publisher's name and country - marked as required

column3: Fill in the title field and the homepage URL
In the ISSN (print) field add xxxx-xxxx

column4: You see the error message: 'This is not a valid ISSN'

column3: Repeat in the ISSN (online) field

column4: You see the same error message

column3: Enter the same ISSN in both fields

column4: You see the error message: Value of this field and pissn field must be different

column3: Change the value of one ISSN

column4: All error messages clear.
Under both ISSN fields the link to 'https://portal.issn.org/resource/ISSN/<issn>' is displayed

column3: Add keywords

column4: As you type, you see suggestions in a list below the box

column3: Select a suggestion

column4: It is added to the box

column3: Add 7 keywords

column4: As you write the 7th keyword, you see the message: You can only select 6 items

column3: Click on the X in two keywords

column4: They disappear

column3: Click in the languages box

column4: You can start to type and suggested languages appear

column3: Select and language and then click the arrow next to it

column4: A dropdown list of all available languages appears.

column3: Click Add Another

column4: Another language field appears

column3: Click 'Remove' next to it

column4: It disappears

column3: Enter the same value in 'Publisher's name' and Other organisation's name'
Click Next

column4: You see the error message: The Publisher name oand Other organisation name cannot be the same.

column3: Repeat the previous step, checking if the validator is case insensitive (e.g. "Publisher's name" and "publisher's Name")

column4: The error message is still displayed

column3: Repeat steps X to X for the Publisher's Name, Country, Other organisation's name, Country
Delete the values from 'Other organisation's name', leave 'Other organisation's country' filled in

column4: You see the error message: You cannot provide a country for the other organisation question without providing the other organisation's name

column3: Fill back in the 'Other organisation's country" field

column4: You can submit the page without providing answers to optional questions.
